extendedInfo.description: DietNote is an app that supports health care diet to record daily weight.You may be able to record the weight of the morning and evening, also put each comment.So you can put them in the comment record the contents of the diet and calories that day, of exercise such as running or walking, and memories of travel destination, see a list of the past, it can be utilized as a diet diary recordings and diet you.I also displayed in an intuitive and easy-to-understand graph, the change in the weight of the morning and evening.Can also be used as a weight management and recording of gestational age, child care.Enables you to check the changes in body weight, while you can check the approximate calorie intake of the day and BMI, diet I fun![Main Features]â Simple input weightÂ  - You can enter your weight easily design and simple button operationÂ  - You can also enter a comment can be entered separately as well as the weight of the morning and eveningâ easy-to-understand graphicalÂ  - Support the diet in the form of easy-to-understand line graph of increase or decrease in weightÂ  - I is useful for weight management in the graph will display the weight divided morning and evening - Changes in body weight of each period can be checked easily because you can change the display period of the graphâ Calendar display functionÂ  - You can display the weight of the morning and evening that you entered in the calendarÂ  - You can also view the details such as BMI and comment When you tap the date of entryÂ  - Holidays in Japan also supportsâ Displays a list recordÂ  - You can easily check the weight of the past and comments slide operationÂ  - The list also displays the BMI of each of the morning and eveningâ OthersÂ  - You can set the target weight and heightÂ  - Initialization of data from the menu
